text: The Astra was a small French cyclecar made by E Pasquet in Paris. The automobile was manufactured only in 1922. ==Features== It had a twin-cylinder two-stroke engine of 496 cc. It featured independent suspension on all four wheels, as well as friction drive. ==References== Category:Cyclecars Category:Cars introduced in 1922 Category:Defunct motor vehicle manufacturers of France
title: Astra (1922 automobile)
